original: // bla ma mkha' 'gro'i bsgrub pa mkha' 'gro'i srog 'dren bzhugs so //
analyzed: bla ma mkha gro sgrub ba mkha gro srog bgrang bzhugs so

analyzed: skyob sems ma rigs drug snang srid lha dre rnams

analyzed: sems snyem thag chod ba skyob su mchi

analyzed: bka zab mo gcod yul nyams len gyis

analyzed: bdud chos skur grol ba sems skyed do

analyzed: sgom la dngos gzhi ni

analyzed: ma h+aa shu nya rig ba rang byung ka dag cing

analyzed: lhun grub rol rtsal gdal ba la

analyzed: kun la khyab ba ye shes che

original: dmigs bsam bral ba bzo med ngang //
analyzed: dmigs bsam bral ba bzo med ngang

analyzed: rang nyid h+r+aihls rnal byor ma

analyzed: rgyan dang cha lugs yongs rdzogs ba

analyzed: gri gug thod ba kha t+w+aam cha

original: brkyang bskum gar gyis pad nyir ro'i //
analyzed: rkyong skum gar gyis pad nyir ro

original: snying khar bardzisa bzhugs ye shes dang // 'jig rten mkha' 'gro grangs med bskor //
analyzed: snying khar bardzisa bzhugs ye shes dang jig rten mkha gro grangs med skor

original: spyi bor pad zlar bla ma dang // dbyer med yum chen sku mdog ser //
analyzed: spyi bor pad zlar bla ma dang dbyer med yum chen sku mdog ser

original: phyag gnyis mnyam bzhag rdo rje ni //
analyzed: phyag gnyis mnyam jog rdo rje ni

analyzed: rtse lnga ldang stabs snom ba bsam

original: zhabs gnyis rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis rdo rje skyil krung bzhugs

analyzed: thugs stod +aahyiga gser d bar

analyzed: brgyud skul ye shes lha rnam ba

original: char bzhin bab ste thim nas 'dres //
analyzed: char bzhin bab ste thim nas dre

analyzed: bstod dbyangs rgya mtshos snyan sgra sgrogs

analyzed: dmigs ba ma yengs dad mos sbor

original: sher snying bzla /
analyzed: sher snying bzla

original: mthar ni yum chen rang la thim //
analyzed: mthar ni yum chen rang la thim

analyzed: gnas bzhir dkar +aahdamara dang hu mthing bam dmar gyur ba las

analyzed: bzlas byed sngags kyis skor ba bsam

analyzed: +aahmhu gu ru d+aak+ki ni kro ti ka li bam ha ri ni sa hu phatah d zer lus kun rdal ba las

analyzed: mkha gro til gang lta bur gtams

analyzed: de dag sngags dbyangs ldir ba yis

analyzed: skyed ba lha yi rnam ba kun

analyzed: bi dzas smras so
